name: Incident report return rate
description: Rate of reports being returned to reporting officers by data wardens by location.

dataset.name: Return rate per location by incident type per month
dataset.query:
select month, min_date, max_date, location, incident_type, all_reports, returned, dw_not_seen, closed,
       CASE WHEN (all_reports-dw_not_seen) = 0 THEN 0.0
            ELSE ROUND((CAST(returned as numeric)/(all_reports-dw_not_seen))*100, 1)
           END as dw_seen_percentage_returned
from (
         select Cast(Date_trunc('month', created_at) AS DATE) as month, to_char(min(created_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as min_date, to_char(max(created_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as max_date,
                COALESCE(r.location, 'All locations') as location,
                COALESCE(ct.description, 'All incident types') as incident_type,
                count(r.id) as all_reports,
                count(CASE WHEN cr.requested_corection = '1' THEN r.id END) as returned,
                count(CASE WHEN r.status in ('DRAFT', 'AWAITING_REVIEW') THEN r.id END) as dw_not_seen,
                count(CASE WHEN r.status in ('CLOSED', 'DUPLICATE', 'NOT_REPORTABLE') THEN r.id END) as closed
         from report as r
                  left join (
             select DISTINCT report_id, '1' as requested_corection
             from correction_request
             where user_action = 'REQUEST_CORRECTION') as cr
                            on r.id = cr.report_id
                  left join (
             select code, description
             from constant_type
         ) as ct
                            on r.type = ct.code
         where r.source = 'DPS' and r.location not in ('NORTH', 'SOUTH')
         group by Date_trunc('month', r.created_at), ROLLUP(r.location), ROLLUP(ct.description))

dataset.name: Locations
dataset.query:
select DISTINCT(location) as location
from report
where source = 'DPS' and location not in ('NORTH', 'SOUTH')
UNION ALL
select 'All locations' as location

dataset.name: Incident Types
dataset.query:
SELECT DISTINCT(description) FROM constant_type_family
UNION ALL
select 'All incident types' as description

report.name: % of incident reports returned per location by incident type / month
report.description: Percentage of incident reports returned to reporting officers by data wardens per location by incident type per month.
